DOC.HEADLINE: ROCKET ATTACK KILLS 4 , INJURES 100 IN KABUL
DOC.TEXT: Rockets slammed into a crowded market and other parts of Kabul on Wednesday , killing at least four people and wounding 100 , hospital officials and witnesses said . Afghanistan ' s battered capital has been ravaged by rocket exchanges between rival Islamic groups that have been vying for power since overthrowing a Communist regime in April , 1992 .
